SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 葡萄酒
留言內容: Fit as expected and style is flowy and flattering. I'm carrying extra Covid weight, but it still hangs on me just like it does on the model. The fabric is soft and comfortable. My only complaint is that it arrived wrinkled (not surprising being folded up for shipping) and the care instructions indicate NO tumble drying and COLD iron only. I ended tried spray on wrinkle relaxer with no success. I finally wet the shirt and hung it to dry in front of a fan. That got MOST of the wrinkles out. Going forward, I'll wash and hang dry and I think it will be fine. It's a pretty shirt that's work-appropriate and comfortable. I recommend.

留言內容: I want to like this shirt…The material is very cool & light. The shirt feels comfortable & almost looks cute. I have a D size chest & the pleat just looks odd. It doesn’t pay right. 商品名稱: VALOLIA 女款 雪紡襯衫 荷葉邊 V 領 短袖 夏季 襯衫 上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 米色
留言內容: With spring upcoming, I wanted some sleeveless tops to wear to the office under my cardigans. I ordered my regular size and it fit. It wasn’t tight and quite loose. Because of my chest size I can’t size down further, but the rest of the shirt was loose enough that a smaller size would look better. This is a good length and covers the backside if you want to wear tights. It’s a light color but not completely see through. I’m wearing a grey bralette and though you can see a shadow of it, it’s not completely visible.I washed and dried this normally and had no issues. I’m short so this may be a better length on someone taller. It’s thin and soft and I liked it. I would recommend ordering your normal size. If you have a small chest, you may be able to size down. This wasn’t difficult to take off even though there’s no stretch to it.

留言內容: Very nice, comfortable yet stylish shirt. Lightweight material makes this an asset to your summer wardrobe. Whether it's a Casual day wear or classy night on the town, this shirt can do both. Not sheer at all so no need to wear a tank underneath.

留言內容: This top is so pretty and light. Has a nice fit and flow to it. It’s so nice and versatile looking. Could easily wear a skirt and blazer with heels and dress this up. Or wear a pair of jeans or jean shorts and look more casual. Very comfortable and the color is such a pretty neutral color. Great buy.

商品名稱: VALOLIA 女款 雪紡襯衫 荷葉邊 V 領 短袖 夏季 襯衫 上衣

留言內容: This top has a very rich lovely red color and fits really well. It is loose and flowy. The flutter sleeves are light and comfortable. The fabric does hold a lot of static, but it's nothing some static spray can't fix. It looks great with a cardigan for work and isn't too dressy but could be if you needed it to be. For reference, I ordered the XXL, I have a 46" bust and 56" hips and it covers everything with room to spare. I will enjoy wearing this top all year.
